name: yacht
tagline: A simple web UI for managing Docker containers
description: Yacht is a self-hosted web UI for managing Docker containers and compose stacks. It offers app templates, logs, resource views, and update management, acting as a simpler alternative to Portainer for homelabs.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Start, stop, and restart Docker containers with a clean web interface instead of CLI commands

features.title: Template Library
features.description: Deploy popular applications quickly using pre-configured templates with sensible defaults

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Manage multi-container applications defined in docker-compose files through the GUI

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View CPU, memory, and network usage for each container in real-time dashboards

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Access container logs directly in the browser with filtering and search capabilities

features.title: Volume Management
features.description: Create, attach, and manage Docker volumes for persistent data storage across containers

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive alerts when newer container images are available for running applications
